website_summaries.verdict: A nourishing overnight mask that moisturizes without clogging pores or leaving skin oily.
pros: Nourishes skin and locks in moisture
Won't give you an oily sheen
cons: It's slow to absorb into skin, so it may feel like it's sitting on your skin instead of sinking in

customer_reviews.title: Beware of fake product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product directly from the Origins website before and for convince ordered from amazon this time. The product I got was not the same. The packaging was quite different, the consistency was much thicker and the smell was off. I am returning it and ordering directly from their website.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! I moved to the Sierra region of CA and my skin became soooooo dry. I noticed the the majority of the women here definitely show the effects of the sun and I don't want that to happen. I use this in the evening and at night. It makes my skin so soft and took away all dryness. I have acne prine skin to ouly products but this has not caused any breakouts. I will use this for life!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin solved
customer_reviews.text: I have super dry skin and this is my go-to for at night. I apply this all over and go to sleep in it and wake up with super plum and soft skin. I have been using this brand for 2 yrs now and it has yet to let me down! LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Keighyla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this I was struggling with my dry face for about a year! I tried everything! This finally worked. I had dry patches on my face and my nose I looked like a snake peeling all the time. My foundation would crack because of my dry skin. Then I tried this and it works wonderfully!!! I apply it once at night and if I wake up with a little dryness I’ll reapply to just the areas. I’ve used this product for a couple of weeks and I hardly have to reapply during the day now! Definitely recommend this for super dry skin!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Flores

customer_reviews.title: It smells good and the smell is light
customer_reviews.text: I have been on and off using this product for over 20 years. It is thick on the sticky side when first applying. But it will be absorbed in 10 minutes. It smells good and the smell is light. I apply it on my whole face right after toner and eye cream. I wear it all night. Next morning I wash it off with or without facial cleanser. My skin feels smooth and soft like it was 100% hydrated!!! I have used different sleeping mask. This one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Hellobaby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product a lot. I was desperate for something to help my chronic dry skin this winter. My face needed more than what my regular face cream was giving me. I had also read that many other women had used this during the day also. Once I tried this at night, my skin was dewy soft in the morning. So I then tried it for daytime also, and it was perfect for this time of the year. I’m Usually very allergic to most skin products, but not to this. I highly recommend this !!!
customer_reviews.author: Carla J

customer_reviews.title: Got my favorite mask
customer_reviews.text: Received very fast and exactly what I expected, Quench overnight mask, one of my favorite products that was recently discontinued by Origins. There is a review below that the product is “not the same as produced by Origins”. This is not true. That review compared Quench mask with new version of avocado and Glacier water mask, two different products. I personally hate new avocado and glacier water version of the mask and was happy to find Quench mask on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Shok

customer_reviews.title: Amazing night mask
customer_reviews.text: Original product. Arrived on time. It's one of the best night masks I've ever used (I have combination skin, acne prone) doesn't break me out.
customer_reviews.author: Asmaa M

customer_reviews.title: Not same product
customer_reviews.text: A thinned out version of the current mask on the market by origins Smells the same but viscosity is thin and watery in comparison to the one on the origins website
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow ! I was looking for some product to moisture my skin, that became very dry over the winter. Ok , the first night I have used it, turned my skin right away in to a soft, moisturized skin, it was such a relief! I have been using it since then every night and enjoy my glow in the morning, during the day I love it to put around my eyes to keep the skin moist all day! Its a true amazing product to keep your skin moist and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Flowergirl

customer_reviews.title: Looking For Moisture - It's in this Tube!!!
customer_reviews.text: At 64 years young, living in Las Vegas - I can use all the moisture I can get. This product is awesome: creamy, light weight and works like a charm. I use it as a daily moisturizer because there is NO moisture in Las Vegas! Combine this with sunscreen and you are good to go for the whole day; re-apply at night before bed with a serum or anti-aging product. Does not clog pores. Slam dunk!
customer_reviews.author: DUCK by marriage

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the winter
customer_reviews.text: I got this because in the winter my skin gets super duper dry. I live in Minnesota so it definitely gets cold here. I heard some good reviews about this and it is definitely too thick for a day moisturizer but I can see a difference in the overall moisture in my skin. It doesn't leave that gross film on the skin, but its actually absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: My face feels moisturized when I wake up
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about two weeks and this moisturizes my face better than anything I’ve tried. I use it at night of course, but I also apply a little in the morning too. It will leave your face shiny for a bit, but I find that my skin pretty much completely absorbs it within 30 min - 1 hr. There’s a light scent which doesn’t really bother me, but I do wish it was unscented. Other than that, I really really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna E G

customer_reviews.title: Now that’s nice
customer_reviews.text: As someone with incredibly thirsty skin I’m always looking for the next miracle mask and this is it! Wash my face like normal and apply this before bed maybe once or twice a week. I wake up with moist beautiful glowing skin! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Denyse Bays

customer_reviews.title: Rosacea and winter sucks... this makes it less stressful
customer_reviews.text: After a shower or face wash, let this soak in and head to bed. By morning your face will be so smooth and healthy. Plus this doesn't smell terrible like a lot of the other night moisturizers. On a bad day i'll load up on this in the morning before the day starts as well. Its a great product for the price and I highly recommend it for anyone who needs some moisture to regulate their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H.

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best facial products I have purchased in a while. Not only does it rehydrate the skin, over time it actually reduces wrinkle lines. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Virgo

customer_reviews.title: Great overnight mask
customer_reviews.text: I wear this when I have stayed up a little too late and need to be extra hydrated in the morning. I just rinse it off in the morning with water. It is a bit sticky at first so I would not recommend for an everyday moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: lladnyk

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly dry skin if I don't moisturize often. In the winter, it is especially difficult to maintain supple skin. Additionally, use of any products for fine lines or any chemical peels just exacerbate the dryness. I use this at night and have sensitivity, dryness, or peeling. It has become a mainstay for my nightly routine!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Tripp-Dieringer

customer_reviews.title: Great mask and doubles as a great winter cream for dewy skin
customer_reviews.text: The scent is amazing! So fresh and a little citrus! Nice and thick with a soft glow! I use this even as a cream in winter months for dewy skin. I love this brand and this is one of my favorite products!
customer_reviews.author: ALO

customer_reviews.title: It smells great, helped my skin condition and it is not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have really dry peeling skin on my chin and I couldn't find a moisturizer to help. I tried this and I will never buy anything else. It smells great, helped my skin condition and it is not really a mask, I put it on in the morning as a moisturizer before make and at night after washing my face. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied shopping experience
customer_reviews.text: Feeling not new,It seems to have been used. The weight is not right,Open the lid has flowed out some.Dissatisfied shopping experience
customer_reviews.author: Nan Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin !
customer_reviews.text: My finace brought this for me and my daughter loved it for her sensitive skin so I sent it to her in college.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first to try this mask, it’s like a thick cream, i’ve been using it for about 5 days but nothing has plumped my face as this cream did, i don’t know what ingredient it contains that does this amazing effect, but it’s one of the best creams i’ve ever used, my face is really dry so moisture wise my skin isn’t so soft yet, but my skin texture and plumpness surely improved, I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R80

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave this to me a sample. I loved it so much I ordered a large tube for myself. A little goes a long way so this will last me a full year I would think. The scent is refreshing. Product is really moisturizing without being gooey. I use it at night or when flying if my skin is dry.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mains

customer_reviews.title: Is it legit?
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet and will be test patching it on my neck first. I'm concerned that it came with zero seal, not plastic around the flip too, no little foil seal on the opening, nothing! Also the code states in was manufactured a year and half ago, a year and a half with no seal makes me question the integrity of the product inside. Two stars for now based on these facts.
customer_reviews.author: Ben P.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: My skin is dry and I have seen such an improvement since using this product. It is so moisturizing I just leave it on overnight and wash it off in the morning and my skin is so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Michelsen

customer_reviews.title: Great facial moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product 6 months each night. It has proven it's worth this winter...no facial dryness. Not greasy. A little goes long way too.
customer_reviews.author: dina

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: Think the product is okay. Mixed feelings as to whether it’s really helping my face or not. I’ll keep using it though and continue to give it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Sliderguy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer ever! I will use this product for the rest of my life! Smells great, feels great, and nourishes my skin better than many competitors. Highly recommend! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: aladyofwar

customer_reviews.title: Package was already opened/used!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product (have bought many times from Origins stores) but likely won’t buy from this seller anymore - When package arrived, was clearly open and had been used. Very gross and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but....
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but they have changed the formula and this one is no longer available. Bummer, I heard the new one isn’t as good.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this product because my skin gets very dry with all the acne medication i’m on and i needed something that works for sensitive skin. This is a great product, i leave it on overnight and my skin is so moisturized in the morning! definitely worth the price and i would repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A

customer_reviews.title: I have sensitive skin and this initially leaves my face ...
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this initially leaves my face slightly reddened when applied...but that goes away and my face felt moisturized by the morning when I woke up.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the consistency and how it just sank into my skin. It did not clog my pores and I left it on all night. My skin looked amazing the next day
customer_reviews.author: Denene Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Made skin BURN
customer_reviews.text: This product made my skin BURN every time I used it. After washing it off my face stung so badly I was trying to fan it off like a crazy person. The only thing that soothes the painful burning was an ICE PACK. Not saying this will happen to everyone, but I don’t have particularly sensitive skin and this thing hurts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: So moisturizing and it smells so good. Great for winter or if you suffer from dry skin regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! Must have for dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: I can definitely feel a difference in just one nights use. Leaves my skin very soft, supple and hydrated. It's very thick so you know it's concentrated but blends in well. Doesn't leaves skin oily or a leave mess on your sheets. Smells pretty good. Perfect for extremely dry skin like mine.
customer_reviews.author: jessica romero

customer_reviews.title: So moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this night cream. I’ve noticed an increase in moisture just in the short time I’ve been using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best scent!
customer_reviews.text: Small size but worth its weight in gold! Works lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Addicted to this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! It’s the only face cream I have found that can keep my skin hydrated during harsh New York winters. Feels amazing, smells great, no toxic ingredients, and I wake up in the morning looking fresh. Big fan over here!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I have a mix of oily and dry skin, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a mix of oily and dry skin, but I have these timeframes when my skin gets very dry and nothing really helps. This was the first product I've used that helps me fight this! I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love, love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love, love this product. My skin is supple and smooth. I wash my face thoroughly, pat dry it, apply moisturizer serum,let that dry and then apply this overnight mask...I do this daily and my skin looks amazing, I get compliments that I look radiant! It's my first purchase, it was recommended to me, I will definitely buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, sensitive skin and use just a bit of this at night and in the morning as my face lotion. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: KTL

customer_reviews.title: Not as hydrating as expected
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say I love this product but I’m really not seeing a difference in my skin with this. I love the smell of it but I wake up feeling just as dry even with my humidifier blasting.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Delightfully Thick & Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on thickly and absorbs quickly. It’s perfect if you live in a dry climate to rehydrate your skin before bed. The scent is pleasant and it seems the tube will last for a while with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Whaley

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I used this product daily. It's pricy but worth it. At night, I my face, beck and chest with warm water and a washcloth, followed by a think layer of this product (extra around my eyes). In the morning, I mix a small amount with my concealer to even out my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: adinalav

customer_reviews.title: WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Love this, non greasy, all night moisturizer. Have used it in the past and will continue to use it
customer_reviews.author: Della R Cimini

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry, dry, dry skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so dry that I use this mask both morning and night. Not greasy and I've had no breakouts. AND it really does moisturize! Love their other products, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sporter

customer_reviews.title: Strange Smell / Sticky
customer_reviews.text: This product has a strange of smell. If you cannot tolerate " medicine smell ", do not buy it. A little sticky. Definitely, It is not a " water " type of product.
customer_reviews.author: Hong

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Living in Chicago, with constant drying heat on in the winter, I used to wake up to dehydrated old looking skin. Putting the mask on at night, my skin looks rested, plump and hydrated in the morning. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well on the rest of my face but extremely dries my nose out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing, keeps my skin soft, and is my secret to getting over sunburn FAST.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Haskins

customer_reviews.title: It's good but
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected a little more. It smells amazing though, and it really does work
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: very hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have very dried skin and it's one of the best products I use to help rejuvenate and hydrate my skin
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lemar

customer_reviews.title: Best overnight moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite night moisturizer EVER. My skin has never been better😀
customer_reviews.author: Jenwards

customer_reviews.title: I adore this overnight mask. It has become a ...
customer_reviews.text: I adore this overnight mask. It has become a nightly ritual for me to take the time to apply and massage it into my face. The scent is so soothing and calming. I have found that it has made a huge difference for m skin which is EXTREMELY dry. If you have dry skin this product will work wonders, however if you are on the oily end of the spectrum I would defiantly try and find something perhaps a little on the lighter side.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Super moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! It feels amazing, just what your face needs at night. A few nights wearing it and you can feel and see the difference
customer_reviews.author: S U

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell if it does anything to be honest, but it feels good to put on and is a bit thicker but not too oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Great overnight moisturizing, love the scent and the way my skin looks and feels the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Bellabean

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It was moisturizing. At first, I thought that it was going to make my pillow case dirty. But it did not smear all over my bed and damn, I had this beautiful sheen in the morning, after just one use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Same as if buying in the store, but more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nightly use
customer_reviews.text: Really helps hydrate my dry skin without causing any breakouts. I use nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Smells good, feels good, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Radicke

customer_reviews.title: She seemed to have better luck than I did
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after a recommendation from a friend. She seemed to have better luck than I did. First of all the scent is overpowering and not so pleasant, when applied to your face you smell it all day. Secondly it didn't seem to absorb into my skin. It just felt and looked like it was sitting on top. I felt no moisturizing effects whatsoever. Expensive lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne G.

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask lotion!
customer_reviews.text: If you tend to be very dry... BUY THIS! I use this on the nights before bed that I see I am drying out bc of the weather, or from other products and it totally refreshes my skin. It's thick, but it's not nearly as greasy as some YouTube reviews have suggested. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Awb0424

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell and Feel and Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I can't really tell if my skin is that much more moisturized from using it, but it does have a fantastic smell and feel. It doesn't go on greasy and the ingredients are amazing so Hopefully they're doing what they're supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: AJ PV.

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this overnight mask. I was looking for a moisturizing overnight mask that would allow me to wake up with my face moisturized and fresh. This did the trick! I have really, really dry skin and this helps a lot, especially during the dry, winter months. It also has a great smell!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful! I have some dry areas on my face ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! I have some dry areas on my face that made it look like my skin was peeling and have used many hydrating creams to fix it but nothing worked. I did some researched and bought this because it was highly recommended online, and I now understand why. I followed the directions and put it on at night (it smells good!!!) and woke up feeling great! My skin felt hydrated to the touch and it lasted all day long! My dry areas were fixed and I do not worry about them anymore. Plus, my makeup stays on longer too. VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M.

customer_reviews.title: It hydrates my skin pretty well but it feels kind of
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It hydrates my skin pretty well but it feels kind of greasy
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Your face still feels amazing when you ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Your face still feels amazing when you wake up in the morning! You only need a little so the bottle will last you awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: I like this masque
customer_reviews.text: I like this masque, I think it is available to my dry skin. I do not advise the oil skin buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: I see a big difference in my skin after week will continue using and has a nice sweet smell
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: The first tube I had was fine. This tube had something in it that I ...
customer_reviews.text: The first tube I had was fine. This tube had something in it that I was allergic to and had to go to the doctor as my face was covered with hives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm only 22 with dry skin and it works and smells great.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible for daily use on dry patches. I'm only 22 with dry skin and it works and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously expensive for the amount!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried the product yet but heard great things. Very alarmed by the small tube I got in the mail, 3.4 oz is not worth $35.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Eczema has disappeared!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product! Smells wonderful and this is the first product I've tried that has made my skin look and feel normal. I have terrible eczema on my face that blisters and cracks and after a few days my skin is clear and soft! I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: hannah vanhoe

customer_reviews.title: Yes to this product
customer_reviews.text: I finally received this and have only used it a few times. My skin does feel amazing after I put it on at night. My concerns are: When I opened it, there was not a seal to pull off like most skin care products. Also, I ordered this prime and took a long time with many delays to get here. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: THRILLED!
customer_reviews.text: Age 53 with extremely dry skin, not to mention living in a dry climate. I decided to give this product a try as the finale of my nighttime skin routine. It is AMAZING!! My face feels softer and smoother than it has in years! I love it! Maybe a bit pricey at $32/100ml, but the quantity needed to give your face a final moisturizing touch is tiny, less than the size of a pea. Cannot wait to see the effects of this fantastic cream long-term. The smell is lovely...like fresh summer fruit.
customer_reviews.author: L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great night moisture mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this overnight moisturizer. It’s really the only one I have felt a marked difference in my skin. I only use several drops on my face but there is an over all difference on my face. This cream has a nice scent. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lizotr

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Winter Face Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have incredibly dry skin that is prone to break outs. Hydrating my skin without clogging my pores is virtually impossible. In summer, this lotion is too much for regular use; however, in winter, I can use this morning noon and night and all it does is refresh and soften my skin. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING🤗
customer_reviews.text: I moisturize everyday. Once in the morning and once at night after washing my face. I have combination skin and always used products to take away greasiness, but the problem was my skin was being stripped of oils it needed and produced more and more. I use this as my morning moisturizer and my skin looks AMAZING! I’ve never had a moisturizer work as well as this one does. It makes my skin look hydrated and refreshed. I am a forever customer of Origins now and will continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mercurio

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, this may be a holy grail for me. Not only is it moisturizing but it also magically clears small zits and blemishes
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Sens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality face cream for dry skin !
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this night cream for my face every night I have dry skin and this Cream is the best for me .... and I have used many More that were far more expensive, but this is by far THE BEST For me! thanks to Origins!
customer_reviews.author: Edith K. Farris

customer_reviews.title: Great facial quencher
customer_reviews.text: Nice long drink for the face. It has a sort of woodsy smell but it's not bad; just kind of natural. Doesn't make your face a gooey mess, just sinks in and when you wake up; nice soft skin. My new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: My skin loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin feel calm and soft, NOT GREASY. Its one of my 2 go-to moisturizers, it even performs well under makeup:)
customer_reviews.author: C. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: High quality, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I have very dry skin, so I use this almost every morning mixed with my favorite Kate Somerville lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny4ever

customer_reviews.title: Great overnight mask & shipped very quick
customer_reviews.text: This is so moisturizing, it's for a overnight moisture mask. It's wonderful, I'm very happy, I wake up & my skin is so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look younger
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this mask for 2 years now. Makes me look younger
customer_reviews.author: varen

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion! I have very dry and sensitive skin. I can’t use just any lotion. It’s worth the price to me
customer_reviews.author: N. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good, not the best
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to finally order this product after seeing some youtubers using the origins brand and this product in particular. I have to say, it have the most amazing orange/mango smell, I love putting it on. When i put it on my skin instantly feels smooth and moisturized. I agree with some other reviews, it really Dosent make my skin feel amazingly soft the next day. I have definitely tried other products that work better. Tip: use a toner that will prepare your skin to absorb the product better! I feel like this helps. Probably wouldn't buy again :/
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive and dry
customer_reviews.text: I have patchy dry skin and this product has eliminated all of that! I use it at night and on cold mornings. I also have extra sensitive skin and I’ve had no issues. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I like this moisturizer a lot. I have eczema on my face and it does not cause flair ups. It offers good moisture without feeling greasy. It has a light pleasant scent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It is the most wonderful night mask that I ever have
customer_reviews.text: It is my second order already . Can’t explain how good it is , it fells awesome , soft and hydrated when I wake up in the morning . Will keep buying it !
customer_reviews.author: Little star

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't burn my eyes like many other things
customer_reviews.text: Very hydrating without being greasy. Doesn't burn my eyes like many other things. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: I Woke Up Like This
customer_reviews.text: Wake up with a dewy glow and moisturized face. I use a dime size each night and it has changed the game.
customer_reviews.author: YachtBae

customer_reviews.title: customer of this product for years
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for at least 10 years. I never want to run out of it. It does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.author: snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Origins gets a solid five stars from me. They never cease to impress me with their products. I'm 20 years old, and I have severe eczema, and my face is very leathery and dry naturally. But their drink up mask rejuvenates my skin and makes it look normal and beautiful again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, moisturizers well
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit Origins obsessed but this is by far my favorite product. Smells amazing, a little goes a long way and it totally alleviates my bland dry winter skin. I use this ~3 times a week as part of my nighttime routine. Skin feels amazing in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: jast

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful night treatment
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful night treatment. It goes on very thick and feels super hydrating! You wake up with supple, soft, hydrated skin. Smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Love Origins products
customer_reviews.text: Love Origins products. So amazingly hydrating. My skin is so supple and fresh looking in the morning. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KristineM

product_meta.title: ORIGINS Drink Up-Intensive Overnight Mask to Quench Skin's Thirst, 3.4 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: This product is made of high quality material. It is recommended for romantic wear. This product is manufactured in France.
feature_bullets: Put extra thirsty skin to bed, apply this ultra-moisturing sleeping mask -
And awake in the morning to hydrated, soft and smooth skin!
Infused with NEW Swiss Glacier Water, Hyaluronic Acid & Avocado Butter
Drink Up Intensive drenches extra thirsty skin in 72 hours of non-stop hydration
Get the nourishment your skin needs while you sleep
